Recommendations: 1. Additional long-term projects in the barangay are encouraged.
2. Policies and procedure may be adopted as an internal audit control towards sustainability of extension programs and projects.
3. A new benchmarks survey may be conducted by the program under survey to identify the community's health needs, problems, and resources.
4. External linkages may be strengthened and expanded through initiative and teamwork, and the administration's moral support.

5. The university may consider formulating a comprehensive university extension development program so that each academic unit can contribute to the efficient delivery of technologies generated from research.

6. There is a need to design a 5-year development plan/program/project/activity of the departments extension activities. Likewise, all faculty members may be involved and the sustainability of the said plan/program/project/activity may be given attention.
